title: Sherrill Milnes - Music of the American Revolution, The Birth of
description:
Some beautiful and great tunes here.  The performers are excellent.  American Vicar of Bray pretty much describes most Americans today; it is long and a capella and Sherrill Milnes enunciation and pitch is flawless and very entertaining.


Title 1 = American Fife Ensemble - The Brickmaker March

Title 2 = Continental Harmony Singers - Lamentation Over Boston

Title 3 = Richard Crawford - March for the 3rd. Regt. of Foot, Lord Amherst&#039;s

Title 4 = American Fife Ensemble - British Grenadiers

Title 5 = Sherrill Milnes - Song on Liberty

Title 6 = Liberty Tree Wind Players - General Scott&#039;s March

Title 7 = Seth McCoy - Junto Song

Title 8 = American Fife Ensemble - Lovely Nancy

Title 9 = Sherrill Milnes - American Vicar of Bray

Title 10 = Continental Harmony Singers - Independence

Title 11 = Liberty Tree Wind Players - March of the 35th Regiment

Title 12 = Sherrill Milnes - Liberty Song

Title 13 = American Fife Ensemble - Lady Hope&#039;s Reel

Title 14 = Seth McCoy - Parody Upon a Well-known Liber

Title 15 = Liberty Tree Wind Players - March for the 76th Regt.

Title 16 = Continental Harmony Singers - Warren

Title 17 = American Fife Ensemble - Stone Grinds All

Title 18 = Seth McCoy - The King&#039;s Own Regulars

Title 19 = Liberty Tree Wind Players - Washington&#039;s March

Title 20 = Continental Harmony Singers - A Hymn of Peace
